select count(SJ) from REV where DEL_YN = 'n'
and SJ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') /* subject */
and CON LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') /* content */
and CONCAT(SJ, ' ', CON) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') /* subject + content */

select a.REV_NO ,a.SJ ,a.REV_WRITNG_MB_NO ,c.NICK as rev_writng_mb_nm ,a.DEL_YN ,a.HITCNT ,a.CR_NO ,d.CODE_NM as trplc_no ,(b.MALE_NMPR + b.FEMALE_NMPR) as nmpr ,b.DEPR_DE ,b.ARVL_DE ,a.CON ,a.REG_DE ,a.UPD_DE ,(select count(e.REV_RPLY_NO) from REV_RPLY as e where e.REV_NO = a.REV_NO ) as replyCnt from REV as a, CREW as b, MEMBER as c, CMMN_CODE as d where a.DEL_YN = 'n' and a.CR_NO = b.CR_NO and a.REV_WRITNG_MB_NO = c.MB_NO and b.TRPLC_NO = d.CODE_NO
and a.SJ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and a.CON LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and CONCAT(a.SJ, ' ', a.CON) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
ORDER BY a.REG_DE DESC
LIMIT #{startRow}, 15
